The Heritrix Expert Summit in San Francisco Feb 24-25 is approaching!

If you expressed an interest in attending via the survey at 
<http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/PWGH959>, you should have already 
received a message with attendance details and the agenda.

The tentative agenda was also posted to the list a couple weeks ago:

   http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/6313

There's still room for attendees, and short demos/presentations about 
your work. To attend, RSVP via the survey:

   http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/PWGH959

To arrange a presentation, drop Kris Carpenter <kcarpenter@...> 
a message if you haven't already.

- Gordon @ IA
